page.title: 14SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: Senior Citizens meet on the first Thursday of every month at Hatch Beauchamp village hall. They play Bingo and listen to talks or watch slides shown by a guest. Twice monthly outings are organised,perhaps to the seaside or to an historical house. On these outings members buy lunches and cream teas and often end the day with fish and chips. At their July meeting, the Senior Citizens visit the village school and are entertained by the children. The school children perform a play and sing and play musical instruments. To conclude a pleasant afternoon the older children give their guests tea, which is provided by the parents of the children. As a sign of their appreciation the Senior Citizens give each child an ice lolly and everybody has a good time.
